item.title: Persistent graffiti on 151 Rye Lane SE15 4TL and wrapping around into Bournemouth Road, 3rd July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rye Lane, Peckham, London
